TextView.android:text: Most private higher education institutions in South Africa have a narrow focus, usually offering a range of qualifications in a single field. LISOF specialised in fashion; Prestige Academy focused on business, IT and design studies; Southern Business School specialised in commerce and law; whilst Embury was a specialist teacher training institution. Also, institutions usually either offer qualifications on a campus or through distance learning. With the establishment of STADIO, we can now offer students a wide range of qualifications through various modes of delivery, on campus or from where ever you are, with innovative online capability supporting both modes.
